name: Angry Flappy Bird
description:
Fly the rocket through mysterious journey full of adventure by tapping your finger on the screen to turn left or right.

Try to avoid the obstacles, spikes and keep the angry flappy birds happy, otherwise there is no coming back on earth.

Collect the coins while you fly to unlock rocket boosters and surprises [ Coming Soon ]

Features:

- Simple One Touch Controls

- Collect Coins

- Leadership Board

- Track Achievements

- Catchy Soundtrack

- HD graphics

- Simple and very addictive gameplay

Keep an eye for updates, with new missions to space.

Keep Flying!!! Beat your friends :)
